mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM store_stock WHERE user_store_id = #{userStoreId}

SELECT s.*, c.name as categoryName, p.name as productName, p.brand as brand, p.image as productImage, p.price as productPrice FROM store_stock s , product p, category c WHERE user_store_id = #{userStoreId} and s.product_id = p.id and p.category_id = c.id
SELECT * FROM store_stock WHERE user_store_id = #{userStoreId} and product_id = #{productId}

select s.id, s.name as name, s.address as address, s.wgs84_x, s.wgs84_y, ss.qty from store s, store_stock ss, user_store us where ss.product_id = #{productId} and s.id = us.store_id and us.id = ss.user_store_id ORDER BY (6371 *ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{currentWgs84X})) *COS(RADIANS(s.wgs84_x)) *COS(radians(s.wgs84_y)-RADIANS(#{currentWgs84Y})) +SIN(RADIANS(${currentWgs84X}))*SIN(RADIANS(wgs84_x)))) LIMIT 10;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store_stock_disuse (user_store_id, product_id, qty) VALUES (#{userStoreId}, #{productId}, #{qty})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM store_stock_disuse WHERE user_store_id = #{userStoreId}

SELECT so.id, so.input_at, CONCAT( CASE WHEN COUNT(p.id) > 1 THEN CONCAT( SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(p.name ORDER BY p.id ASC SEPARATOR ', '), ',', 1), ' 외 ', COUNT(p.id) - 1, '개' ) ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(p.name ORDER BY p.id ASC SEPARATOR ', ') END ) AS items FROM product p INNER JOIN store_order_product sop ON sop.product_id = p.id INNER JOIN store_order so ON so.id = sop.order_store_id WHERE so.user_store_id = #{userStoreId} AND so.state = '입고' GROUP BY so.id, so.input_at;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT so.id) FROM product p INNER JOIN store_order_product sop ON sop.product_id = p.id INNER JOIN store_order so ON so.id = sop.order_store_id WHERE so.user_store_id = #{userStoreId} AND so.state = '입고'
